name: Debt Overload
title: High Debt Service Burden
description: In 2023, El Salvador's total debt service reached 82.98% of its exports and 28.83% of its GNI, indicating a significant financial burden on the nation's economy.

name: Regulatory Roadblocks
title: Challenges in Business Entry Regulations
description: In 2024, El Salvador scored 62.23 in the quality of regulations for business entry, highlighting potential barriers for new businesses.

name: Insolvency Inefficiency
title: Inefficient Judicial Insolvency Proceedings
description: With a score of 14.25 in 2024, El Salvador faces challenges in efficiently resolving judicial insolvency proceedings, impacting business continuity.

name: Credit Accessibility
title: Strong Credit Information Infrastructure
description: El Salvador boasts a high score of 85.28 in 2024 for accessibility of information in credit infrastructure, facilitating better financial services.
